document_data.name: Azala
document_data.mainbody: '''Azala Fire-eyes''' ({{Pronounce|ah|ZAYL|ah|refs=}}) was a wizard in [[Teziir]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Azala had a great adventuring career, even helping to defeat the [[Great Worm of Telflamm]] before retiring to a tower in Teziir.
document_data.Activities: Azala was usually busy in her [[magic]]al research and in creating small [[magic item]]s. However, thanks to her close connection with the city's government, she also helped the Teziir militia.
